hero_call_to_action.paragraph1: Unlock your potential with guided self-inquiry and expert support.

motivational.line1: Sometimes, all you know is that something feels off — but not why.
motivational.line2: Other times, you know the problem, but not the way out.

areas.heading: 🎯 Areas We Help

card1.title: Mental Clarity
card1.quote1: I keep overthinking everything — and end up doing nothing
card1.quote2: My mind feels cluttered all the time

card2.title: Finding Direction
card2.quote1: I'm not sure what I want in life
card2.quote2: Everyone expects something different from me — I feel pulled apart

card3.title: Peak Confidence
card3.quote1: I freeze during important moments — even when I'm prepared
card3.quote2: I know my subject, but I struggle to speak with confidence

card4.title: Skill Growth
card4.quote1: I'm stuck in a plateau with my tennis forehand
card4.quote2: I want to improve, but I don't know what's holding me back

card5.title: Relationship Clarity
card5.quote1: Not sure if I should continue my marriage
card5.quote2: We argue often — but I don't know what we're really fighting about

card6.title: Youth Choices
card6.quote1: I'm good at science, but don't know what's next
card6.quote2: My parents want one thing, but I want something else

card7.title: Life Decisions
card7.quote1: I got a job offer, but I'm not sure if it's the right move
card7.quote2: Should I move cities for growth… or stay close to family?

card8.title: Peer Pressure
card8.quote1: Everyone seems to be moving ahead — I feel stuck
card8.quote2: Social media makes me feel like I'm always behind

areas.not_seeing_challenge: Not seeing your challenge here? Explore how DrishiQ can help you find clarity —

features.heading: Features

card1.title: 1. Emotionally Intelligent, Judgment-Free Conversations
card1.description: Unlike typical solutions, DrishiQ engages in deep, thoughtful dialogue. It listens, reflects, and helps you organize your thoughts without rushing to fix or label — creating a safe space for inner clarity.

card2.title: 2. Inclusive by Design — Paid, Sponsored, or Giving Back
card2.description: Clarity shouldn't be a privilege. Whether you're ready to purchase a session, need help but can't pay, or want to sponsor someone else's breakthrough, DrishiQ connects seekers and supporters in a shared circle of growth.

card3.title: 3. Built for Global Connection — Multilingual, Human-Centric
card3.description: DrishiQ speaks your language — literally. With multilingual support and cultural sensitivity, it ensures that anyone, anywhere, can explore their mind and challenges without barriers.

features.cta_description: DrishiQ is here to help you pause, reflect, and move forward — no matter who you are or where you're from.

support.heading: Clarity Shouldn't Be a Privilege
support.description: Some people face tough choices every day — but don't have the space or support to reflect.
support.chai_seller_story: A chai seller figuring out how to help his son pick a better path than his own.
support.security_guard_story: A night shift security guard quietly wondering if it's time to change jobs — but unsure where to begin.
support.college_student_story: A college student from a modest family, good at studies but completely lost about what comes next.
support.not_looking_for_sympathy: They're not looking for sympathy. They're looking for clarity. While they've taken the first step by reaching out, they simply can't afford a session.
support.sponsorship_description: At DrishiQ, we make sure every sponsorship goes to someone who truly needs it — someone who's ready to reflect, grow, and move forward, but just needs a little help getting started.

card1.title: How to Build Self-Awareness
card1.description: Explore practical tips and stories to deepen your self-understanding and gain clarity in your decision-making process.

card2.title: Personal Growth Journeys
card2.description: Real stories from people who transformed their lives with DrishiQ and found the clarity they were seeking.

card3.title: Mindful Decision Making
card3.description: Learn techniques for making better decisions through mindful reflection and emotional intelligence.

testimonials.heading: What Users Say
testimonials.real_stories: Real stories. Honest reflections. See how DrishiQ made a difference
testimonials.story1: DrishiQ helped me break through my mental blocks and find clarity.
testimonials.story2: The self-inquiry process was eye-opening and empowering.
testimonials.one_story: One story. One spark. One step forward —

cta.heading: When Someone Needs Clarity - You Can Help Them Find It
cta.every_day_someone_stuck: Every day, someone is stuck — overwhelmed, uncertain, and unable to afford the space to think things through.
cta.they_might_be: They might be a student questioning their future, a parent weighed down by silent pressure, or a worker quietly asking, 'What's next for me?'
cta.if_you_can_give: If you can give, give someone that moment.
cta.a_quiet_shift: A quiet shift in someone's life might begin with your support.
cta.your_donation_helps_us: Your donation helps us match real people with real needs — no noise, no waste. Just honest, thoughtful reflection for those who need it most.
cta.if_you_need_help: If you need help, ask — without hesitation.
cta.cant_afford_session: Can't afford a session? That doesn't make your challenge less important.
cta.tell_us_challenge: Tell us what you're going through. We'll try our best to match your request with a sponsored session — because your clarity matters, too.
cta.we_hold_space: At DrishiQ, we hold space for both — because clarity should be shared, not gated.

about.heading: About DrishiQ
about.description1: DrishiQ is your intelligent clarity companion — a platform where thoughtful conversations help you explore your inner world, untangle complex challenges, and make better decisions.
about.description2: Blending emotional intelligence with smart, unbiased insight, DrishiQ connects seekers, supporters, and storytellers in a human-centric space for personal growth, reflection, and support.

description3.prefix: Clarity is just one conversation away -

0.title: 🧠 Get Unstuck. Get Clarity.
0.text: Feeling foggy, overwhelmed, or torn between choices? DrishiQ helps you organize your thoughts, reflect deeply, and make wiser decisions — through emotionally intelligent, AI-powered conversations.

1.title: 💬 Can't Pay? Your Challenge Still Matters.
1.text: Struggling to figure things out but can't afford a session? We hear you. At DrishiQ, no voice goes unheard. Share your challenge — and we'll try to connect you with a sponsored session.

2.title: 💚 Give the Gift of Clarity
2.text: A single conversation can shift someone's world. Donate a session to help someone move from confusion to confidence. Your kindness could be the turning point in their journey.

3.title: 🔄 Share to Inspire. Earn Credits.
3.text: Did DrishiQ help you solve a challenge or gain emotional clarity? Your story could inspire someone else — and earn you session credits in return.

4.title: 🌍 One Platform. Many Journeys.
4.text: Every journey to clarity is different. Some seek guidance, others offer support. DrishiQ brings it all together — powered by insight, empathy, and shared human growth.

5.title: 🤝 Be Part of the Clarity Circle
5.text: Join a growing community of seekers, sponsors, and storytellers. DrishiQ isn't just about answers — it's about connection, compassion, and collective growth.

we_live_in_a_world_of_increasing_complex:
We live in a world of increasing complexity. Each day, individuals silently battle emotional and mental weight.
              These dilemmas may appear personal, but their consequences are universal—burnout, fractured relationships, depression, disengagement.

why_we_struggle_with_everyday_problems: Why We Struggle With Everyday Problems
we_all_face_problems_some_are_obvious_a_: We all face problems. Some are obvious — a missed deadline, a relationship argument, a looming health concern. Others simmer beneath the surface: dissatisfaction at work, an unclear life direction, or emotional burnout. Yet, strangely enough, most of these problems don't explode because of how serious they are, but because of how long they go unaddressed.
this_delay_this_tendency_to_ignore_postp: This delay — this tendency to ignore, postpone, or overcomplicate our challenges — creates a cascading effect. A small misunderstanding becomes a permanent fallout. A minor stressor becomes chronic anxiety. A moment of confusion becomes years of feeling lost.
the_hidden_layers_of_everyday_problems: The Hidden Layers of Everyday Problems
contrary_to_popular_belief_most_problems: Contrary to popular belief, most problems are not isolated events. They are often multi-layered experiences influenced by our environment, relationships, unspoken expectations, and personal beliefs. Think of them like onions — you have to peel through the emotional layers, assumptions, and perspectives to truly understand what you're dealing with.
a_fight_with_your_partner_may_not_be_abo: A fight with your partner may not be about the dishes — it could be about feeling unappreciated.
trouble_focusing_at_work_may_not_be_abou: Trouble focusing at work may not be about laziness — it might signal a deeper disconnect with your goals.
feeling_stuck_in_life_isnapost_always_ab: Feeling stuck in life isn't always about a lack of options — it could stem from not knowing how to process your inner conflict.
so_why_donapost_we_solve_these_problems_: So Why Don't We Solve These Problems Sooner?
the_result_unresolved_issues_become_life: The result? Unresolved issues become life patterns.
drishiq_your_thinking_partner_in_a_noisy: DrishiQ: Your Thinking Partner in a Noisy World
drishiq_is_built_to_address_this_exact_h: Drishiq is built to address this exact human dilemma. It's more than a tool — it's a thinking companion that helps you organize your thoughts, confront your challenges, and gain clarity through intelligent, unbiased conversation.
unlike_motivational_quotes_or_advice_thr: Unlike motivational quotes or advice threads, Drishiq doesn't throw pre-cooked solutions at you. It:
maps_out_the_people_and_expectations_aro: Maps out the people and expectations around your problem.
helps_you_peel_back_the_layers_until_the: Helps you peel back the layers — until the core is revealed.
once_that_happens_solutions_become_obvio: Once that happens, solutions become obvious. They arise naturally, because you finally understand the real issue.
why_timing_is_a_myth_and_understanding_i: Why Timing Is a Myth — and Understanding Is Power
we_often_tell_ourselves_quotiaposll_deal: We often tell ourselves, "I'll deal with this when the time is right." But truthfully, time doesn't fix problems — understanding does.
what_expectations_are_driving_the_pain: What expectations are driving the pain
what_outcomes_matter_most_to_you: What outcomes matter most to you
_you_gain_power_not_the_power_to_control: — you gain power. Not the power to control everything, but the power to act with clarity, courage, and conviction.
thataposs_what_drishiq_empowers_you_to_d: That's what Drishiq empowers you to do.
start_small_think_deep_live_clear: Start Small. Think Deep. Live Clear.
you_donapost_need_to_wait_for_a_crisis_y: You don't need to wait for a crisis. You can bring your smallest confusions, daily tensions, or emotional fog into Drishiq — and start peeling.
youaposll_be_surprised_how_much_clarity_: You'll be surprised how much clarity can come from a single conversation.
because_sometimes_the_problem_is_not_the: Because sometimes, the problem is not the problem. It's how you've been thinking about it.
let_drishiq_help_you_change_that_one_pro: Let Drishiq help you change that — one problem at a time.
learn_how_to_reduce_emotional_overload: Learn how to reduce emotional overload.
start_by_clarifying_what_you_truly_want: Start by clarifying what you truly want.
